```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(psych)
library(lfe)
```
```{r}
df <- read.csv("./Data/Citation.csv")

```

```{r}
df %>%
  mutate(PaperID=as.factor(PaperID)) ->
  df

summary(df)
```


```{r}
f <- PaperImportance_Degree ~ AuthorImportance_MaxDegree + YearsToNow + ReferenceNum + AuthorNum  | Year

model <- felm(f, df)
summary(model)
```
